data.eml:eml: A molecular phylogeny of Speonemadus Jeannel, 1922 with description of two new species from Morocco (Coleoptera: Leiodidae: Cholevinae: Anemadini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fresneda, Javier, Faille, Arnaud, Fery, Hans, Ribera, Ignacio (2019): A molecular phylogeny of Speonemadus Jeannel, 1922 with description of two new species from Morocco (Coleoptera: Leiodidae: Cholevinae: Anemadini). Zootaxa 4543 (1): 1-36, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4543.1.1
